Articles.Content: Hello guys, I recently downloaded KSP via Steam and really want to try out some of the cool mods I've seen, however, I cannot seem to find the KSP or steamapps anywhere on my computer. Does anyone here have an idea on how to do this? Any help would be greatly appreciated.
This isn't the thread to post this in. Try the "How to" forum.
should be in a steam folder then kerbal or something , not sure, ill take a look...

IIRC you're going to have to go to finder, then Alt+ library. Then you're going to go to application support, and find your steam folder. It should be in there somewhere. I don't know which folder to put it in, but it's in there somewhere.
